name: BROCCOLI QUEST II: THE DARK SACRAMENT
name_original: BROCCOLI QUEST II: THE DARK SACRAMENT
description:
(fullscreen button in bottom right corner, arrow keys or wasd to move (or swipe to move on mobile)! interact with everything!)

ON THE HALLOWED NIGHT OF THE HELL MOON...

Your oven is broken. 

What starts as an errand merely to repair your broken oven quickly (d)evolves into a journey to prevent certain doom at the hands of a broccoli-shortage-causing cult known only as "BLOOD GUYS". 

FEATURES OF BROCCOLI QUEST II INCLUDE:

  • RUNNING ERRANDS FOR A GROCERY STORE
  • DOING TRIVIA WITH AN ALLIGATOR
  • BANISHING A CULT
  • WANDERING THE DESERT

BROCCOLI QUEST II features almost 4x the content of the original BROCCOLI QUEST!  The game will run you about thirty minutes if you stop to smell the flowers (and find all the secret fly swarms!)

If you run into any problems or just want to give me a follow, my twitter is @goblin_dev_ !!
